posts.post_title: ~~~~~Talk of the Diamond wanted to Buy~~~~~
posts.post_content:
Thak you, I found two 




It was over 3 decades ago when I purcheased my first Dule Talk of the Fiamond cards from a friend of Lew Lipset at the spring Willow Grove event. I believe it was bought from Kecin Strause!

After all this time has passed, I'd love to buy several more from this series. The condition is not as important as the fact that I meed a good deal n them. 
If you have 1, 2 or more, message me the description and best price!

I'm hoping to swing a deal (s) today!

Thank you,

Bill

I have these 3, and am willing to live without them.
Make me an offer, and if it gets me even they are yours.
It might take a bit to locate and scan all of them, but I will if you are more than casually interested....dterwilliger@frontiernet.net

Foul BalkSGC 5.5 EX+
A Home Run SGC 5 EX
Left Field SGC 3 VG
